ns0:Concept.displayName: VR-36 Mental component summary (MCS) score - oblique method T-score
VR-36 Mental component summary (MCS) score - orthogonal method T-score

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent the Veterans RAND 36 Item Health Survey (VR-36) Mental Component Summary (MCS) Score.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Assessment, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with codes to identify the Veterans RAND 36 Item Health Survey (VR-36) Mental Component Summary (MCS) Score. This is a grouping of LOINC codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
